title: The King of Comedy
cast: Robert De Niro, Jerry Lewis, Diahnne Abbott, Sandra Bernhard, Ed Herlihy
summary: Rupert is an aspiring stand-up comedian, who is willing to go the extra mile in his attempt to appear in the late night show hosted by his idol.

title: The Comedy
cast: Tim Heidecker, Eric Wareheim, James Murphy, Jeffrey Jensen, Gregg Turkington
summary: Indifferent to the notion of inheriting his father's estate, a restless, aging New Yorker passes time with his friends in games of mock sincerity and irreverence.

title: InAPPropriate Comedy
cast: Adrien Brody, Lindsay Lohan, Michelle Rodriguez, Rob Schneider, Noelle Kenney
summary: In this comedy film, a computer tablet full of the world's most hilariously offensive apps breaks through the borders of political correctness, stirring up cultural anarchy.

title: King of Comedy
cast: Stephen Chow, Karen Mok, Cecilia Cheung, Man-Tat Ng, Kai-Man Tin
summary: A bar girl hires a struggling actor to give her acting lessons so that she can feign a greater interest in her customers. The longer they work together, the more they find they have in common.

title: The Broken Hearts Club: A Romantic Comedy
cast: Timothy Olyphant, Dean Cain, Zach Braff, Ben Weber, Matt McGrath
summary: An insight into the turbulent lives and loves of a gay clique based in Los Angeles.
